title: Despite genocide accusations, Aung San Suu Kyi's party is on track to win another term
description: Myanmar is set to vote on Sunday in its second democratic general election since the end of oppressive military rule -- a poll that's expected to be marked by ethnic divisions and health concerns over rising coronavirus infections.

title: Trump has told people he has no plans to concede
Trump calls for ballot counting scenario where votes legally cast by military would be thrown out
description: As President Donald Trump baselessly claimed that all votes received after Election Day are illegal, he attacked the absentee ballots of military members and their spouses that, by law, must be counted.

title: Here's why the vote count is still going in key states
description: The presidential race between President Donald Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden remains uncalled as election workers across the nation, including in key states, continue to plow through ballots.

title: The momentum of the race has shifted in Biden's favor
description: Democrat Joe Biden is closing on President Donald Trump in tense vote counts in Pennsylvania and Georgia, two states that the current occupant of the White House cannot afford to lose if he is to keep alive his hopes of a second term.

title: Twitter permanently suspends Steve Bannon account after talk of beheading
description: Twitter permanently suspended an account belonging to former White House chief strategist Steve Bannon after he suggested Thursday morning that Dr. Anthony Fauci and FBI Director Christopher Wray should be beheaded. His comments were made in a video posted to his Facebook, YouTube, and Twitter accounts.

title: 100 dead in Guatemala as Tropical Depression Eta heads for Cuba
description: Dozens of people are dead and hundreds have been evacuated after Tropical Depression Eta slammed into Central America, flooding homes and bringing devastating landslides.

title: Republican leaders press Trump team to detail fraud charges
description: GOP leaders are nervously watching President Donald Trump's erratic handling of an election that's slipping away from him, delicately urging him and his team to clearly make a specific case about voting impropriety or accept the will of the American public.

title: Stocks are flat as post-election surge hits pause
description: Stocks were mostly unchanged on Friday as investors still wait for a winner to be declared in the US presidential election. But Wall Street rebounded from earlier premarket lows after the jobs report showed the economy continues to recover from the worst of the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Trump administration moves forward with $2.9 billion drone sale to UAE, source says
description: The US State Department informed Congress Thursday of the Trump administration's intent to sell 18 armed MQ-9B drones to the United Arab Emirates for an estimated $2.9 billion, a congressional aide told CNN on Friday.

title: Watch this cruise ship assembled in seconds
description: Timelapse video of the brand-new Iona by P&O Cruises is the latest development in the cruising industry devastated by the coronavirus pandemic

title: Why concession speeches matter
description: Concession speeches help maintain peace after elections, but they're not legally required. So what happens when those speeches deviate from tradition?

title: Hear what's happening in the West Wing
description: CNN's Kaitlan Collins reports on the mood and activity inside the White House as Joe Biden inches closer to 270.

title: The Democratic earthquake in Georgia
description: One of the great cliffhangers of the historic 2020 election has been if Democrat Joe Biden will win against President Donald Trump in the state of Georgia. While the final tally is still unknown, one conclusion is inescapable: Republicans can no longer count on Georgia as a bastion they dominate.

title: TikTok is swooning over a new kind of celebrity: election analysts
description: Have you really ever made it until there's a fancam?

title: In pictures: America waits
description: Election Day came and went without a winner. Now we wait.

title: Johnny Depp asked to resign from the 'Fantastic Beasts' franchise
description: The next installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" franchise will have a new Grindelwald.

title: Sean Connery's luxury French Riviera villa can be yours for $35 million
description: If you're dreaming of the luxurious life of an international man of mystery, you could be in luck -- Sean Connery's former French Riviera residence is on the market for €30 million ($35.4 million).

title: Fox News tells anchors not to call Biden 'President-elect,' then seems to change its tune
description: Fox News is instructing its anchors not to call Joe Biden the "President-elect" when the network calls the race, according to two memos obtained by CNN.

title: Solskjaer defiant despite intense scrutiny over Man Utd future
description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer began his childhood as Greco-Roman wrestler, following in his father's footsteps.

title: Watch how this massive cruise ship is assembled in seconds
description: It took two years to build, but the entire construction process for a huge new ship from P&O Cruises can be viewed in just over a minute thanks to this incredible timelapse video.

title: This lava planet has 'rocky' weather and winds many times the speed of sound
description: If you thought life on Earth during a pandemic was tough, imagine living on a lava planet, thrashed by violent weather, with rocks literally raining down and the wind howling at thousands of miles per hour.

title: Ex-astronaut Mark Kelly keeps Democrats' slim hopes for Senate majority alive with Arizona win
description: Democrat Mark Kelly will defeat Republican Sen. Martha McSally in Arizona's special election, CNN projects Friday, flipping a seat from red to blue as Democrats make a final push for the Senate majority.

title: A London penthouse with access to an Oval Office just sold for $181 million
description: The next US President won't be the only person with keys to the Oval Office, after a London penthouse sold for over $180 million in a building with its own replica of the famous room.

title: Remember When Kylie Minogue wore gold hotpants?
description: With its patchwork of fruit stalls and cheap household goods, North End Road market in West London isn't famous for its celebrity clientele. But it did supply one item of clothing to Kylie Ann Minogue that will live on in pop culture history for ever: A pair of gold lamé hotpants.

title: Remember when Kylie Minogue's gold shorts became a piece of pop history?
description: Over her decade-spanning career Kylie Minogue has become known for reinvention. Her triumphant return to pop in 2000 may be her most memorable comeback, all because of a pair of tiny gold shorts.

title: How House Republicans shocked the political world
description: The biggest surprise of the 2020 election wasn't Donald Trump's likely loss to Joe Biden or even Senate Republicans' seeming ability to keep their majority intact. It was that House Republicans, facing predictions from the political prognosticators of potential double-digit seat losses, will wind up picking up seats when all the votes are counted.

title: CNN magic wall: How Biden took lead in Pennsylvania
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden has taken the lead in the crucial battleground state of Pennsylvania.  CNN's John King explains how winning the state would give him an insurmountable lead over President Donald Trump.

title: Why Trump's claims of voter fraud just don't make sense
description: CNN's Abby Phillip, Dana Bash and Jake Tapper explain why President Donald Trump's baseless claims of voter fraud and a rigged election do not add up amid an election that has seen the GOP perform better than expected in congressional and senatorial races.

title: NBA eyes $1 billion bonanza with Christmas start
description: Don't worry, basketball fans -- you're now just 47 days away from your next fix of hoops action.

title: Russian lawmakers consider bill that would give Putin lifelong immunity from prosecution
description: Russian lawmakers submitted a draft bill that could grant former presidents lifelong immunity from criminal prosecution beyond their terms of office, state-run news agency TASS reported Thursday.

title: Has Big Tech locked in two more years of dominance?
description: It's been a good week to own shares of Amazon, Microsoft and Apple.

title: Don't let election stress ruin your sleep (here's what to do)
India is letting WhatsApp offer payments to millions more users
description: Millions more WhatsApp users in India can finally start sending each other money through the app.

title: More restrictions as US tops 100,000 new Covid-19 infections for second day in a row
Trump's speech makes Stephen Colbert choke up
description: Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel, James Corden, and Stephen Colbert poke fun at the ongoing election count and President Trump's dishonest election speech.

title: Tesla just rolled out its own tequila. It's already sold out
description: Elon Musk has already gotten people to buy flamethrowers, short shorts and surfboards. Now he's throwing in some tequila, too.

title: Vintage photos show British vacationers gone wild
description: Butlin's vacation resorts were an institution in post-war Britain. The self-contained camps -- where guests were housed in wooden chalets, fed and entertained on-site -- provided a new kind of inexpensive luxury for working families.

title: Jon Ossoff: I believe history is unfolding in Georgia
description: Georgia Senate candidate Jon Ossoff explains to Don Lemon why he believes history is being made in Georgia during the 2020 election.

title: Toddler's table tennis game takes internet by storm
description: 3-year-old Jiang Yunbo is a talented toddler who has gone viral in China because of his ping-pong proficiency.

title: Former Republican senator: 'Shocking' to hear Trump say these things
description: Former Sen. Rick Santorum (R-PA) reacted to President Donald Trump's address from the White House press briefing room where he unleashed a fury of baseless claims about the 2020 presidential election. Santorum said it was "very disappointing and shocking" to hear the allegations and hoped Republicans would defend the election's integrity.

title: 'Complete farce': Abby Phillip on Trump's misleading speech
description: CNN's Dana Bash, Abby Phillip and Jake Tapper react following President Donald Trump's speech from the White House briefing room, where he repeated false claims that "legal" votes will show him winning.

title: 2020 election causing Americans to stress eat
description: Eating your way through the stress of the election... CNN's Jeanne Moos counts calories, instead of ballots.
